description: This Java class defines a REST controller for a Spring Boot application, providing basic endpoints such as welcome, documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller handling basic endpoints such as greeting, documentation redirect, health check, and info for the backend.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message for the root endpoint.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to Swagger UI documentation page, preserving the original request scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns application health status as a simple string.
